title: A novel magnetic FSM-16 supported ionic liquid/Pd complex as a high performance and recyclable catalyst for the synthesis of pyrano[3,2-c]chromenes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16401-16410
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01381F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Azar Jahanbakhshi, Mahnaz Farahi
In this work, Fe3O4@FSM-16/IL-Pd was successfully designed and synthesized via a new procedure of palladium(II) complex immobilization onto magnetic FSM-16 using an ionic liquid, as a novel heterogeneous nanocatalyst.
